# dog-facts
Interesting dog facts (or not interesting)

![](https://nodei.co/npm/dog-facts.png)

## Usage:

```js
const dogFacts = require('dog-facts');

let randomFact = dogFacts.random();
// "Dogs have no sense of time."

let allFacts = dogFacts.all;
// [
//   "Puppies have 28 teeth and adult dogs have 42.",
//   "Hollywoodâ€™s first and arguably best canine superstar was Rin Tin Tin, a five-day-old German Shepherd found wounded in battle in WWI France and adopted by an American soldier, Lee Duncan. He would sign his own contracts with his paw print."
//   ...
// ]
```
